hotels.description: A home to relax at the 'city' peek with all the facilities near you
hotels.amenities: Outdoor Swimming Pool, Self Cooking Station,spa and wellness centre
hotels.address: 1/1, Swami Vivekananda Road, Ulsoor, Ulsoor, 560008 Bangalore, India
reviews: The location is excellent. An oasis in the heart of the city. Very clean. Exceptional service
Best place to relax with friends and family
Humble staff good breakfast and great ambiance
Pool was not covered and just in front of the breakfast deck. The staff also cleared the plates from our table, while food was on it and we weren't done eating.

hotels.description: A cool place to relax at Lake side
hotels.amenities: Outdoor Swimming Pool, Free onsite parking,spa and wellness centre
reviews: Breakfast buffet was fantastic. From Indian cuisine to a crepes chef. All abundant, of the highest quality
The personalised interaction,the setup,the way they take care of every little thing and truly make your stay easy,and very pleasant.
Nothing. We went to Mexican night which was amazing food and tequila pairing - wish we‚Äôd know it was going to be such a lavish dinner ahead of time.

hotels.description: A luxurious but affordable stay as in your home
hotels.amenities: 24 hr Homely Food, Security, Children's Park
hotels.address: Upadhyaya Nagar, Karakambadi Road, 517507 Tirupati, India
reviews: Very neatly maintained. When my mother had a health issue , staff was super supportive and immediately got wheelchair to the room to help her get to the car
Spacious ambiance, good staff , awesome thali great stay

hotels.description: An affordable family stay spot at the 'City' heart
hotels.amenities: 24 hr Homely Food, Swimming Pool, Security
reviews: You can get a lot of peace. The view is very beautiful. And the food is amazing

hotels.description: An affordable family stay spot at the 'City' heart
reviews: Excellent rooms and this property is newly build property and we can view the mountain view from the room it self and staff is very cooperative and they helped me in getting Balaji Darshan recommend for the families
The Staff is very Polite and Nice, Clean and spacious rooms with luxury beds. Location is Peaceful and view of mountains is good. Nice place to stay.. Recommended üëç

Its a very good place to stay. Rooms are very spacious and maintanence also superb.Its located very near to busstand railway station and few temples are near by it will not take more than 10 to 15 min.

hotels.description: An affordable family stay spot near Srinivasa temple
reviews: We had a very tasty and delicious breakfast stay was awesome staff very helping thanks
Cordial staff, Restaurant is very good and staff are very courteous and excellent hospitality
BREAKFAST IS AMAING AND STAY WAS VERY GOOD STAFF ALSO VERY HELPFUL I WOULD LIKE TO REALLY APPRECIATE GAYATHRI, BHASKAR AND MS SINGH

hotels.description: An affordable family stay spot near Srinivasa temple
hotels.address: 1-10-147&148, Mayuri Marg Begumpet, Begumpet, 500016 Hyderabad, India
reviews: Buffet breakfast was very good, as was the service from the front desk and housekeeping staff. special mention to mr.siddarth for his patient help
Great staff, great breakfast, clean and comfortable room

hotels.description: Affordable luxury with pool and great dining
hotels.amenities: Swimming Pool, Spa, Restaurant,24-hour Room Service, Bar
reviews: very awesome neat and clean room nice service, good for family stay and the couple also, good food dining area and pool
Only the location is good but the staff's support and behavior is zero. They don't even bother to clear the room guests have to remind them
Good place to stay. Around 2 km from Calangute beach. Excellent food. Staff co-operative. Taxi stand in front of hotel.

hotels.description: This 5 Star Resort in Goa is located in Cavelossim
hotels.amenities: Swimming Pool, Private beach, Spa, Jacuzzi,Kids play area
reviews: radisson hotels are simply best
There is no proper designated smoking area for guests
Just wow food was good little far from Central Goa Pool

hotels.description: This 5 Star Resort in Goa is located in Utodra beach
hotels.amenities: Swimming Pool, Private beach, Spa, Restaurant, Kids play area, Indoor games
reviews: Neat and clean rooms
swimming pool maintenance was good
Room were very small for the family of 3

hotels.description: This 5 Star hotel in Bangalore is located in Domlur Layout.
hotels.amenities: Free parking, conference room, Spa, Restaurant, Kids play area, 24 hrs room service
reviews: Amazing, place with lush green forest style outlook
My stay was nice, hotel room was as per my expectation
Staff was cooperative and friendly would like to stay again

hotels.description: One of the best hotels in the city
reviews: You can get a lot of peace
The view is very beautiful. And the food is amazing

hotels.description: best place to stay for any office purposes
reviews: Nonveg food is simply super
24/7 customer service and friendly staff

hotels.description: Free Cancellation till 24 hrs before check in
reviews: Taj krishna is well maintained. Kids friendly. Staff were very helpful. We used swimming pool with the kids. Kids enjoyed the stay. Food was excellent.
I have not received the discount coupon as mm t promised while booking. But i did not receive the coupon.
The ambience was good and the room was very neat, the breakfast spread was huge and the quality of stay and food is excellent overall, the staff are very courteous, overall a great stay
Stayed in 8th floor. The room lighting is poor and must be improved. Some are not functioning and some are flickering. The tv channels are distorted. Food is ok but staff seems to be lacking passion.
